channel.title: Milestone 1 Requirements :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: For this milestone, you will be creating classes to represent the entrées and sides served at “Dogs ‘N Such” - a fast-food franchise focused on hot dogs. These will be created within the Data project of the solution you accepted from GitHub classroom. General requirements: You need to follow the style laid out in the C# Coding Conventions Assignment requirements: You will need to create Enum classes (2) Hot Dog class
